text: <@UQWGKUEN7>, I hope you can help me with this. Is there a way to send report excel email to other people in my team so they can directly download it from the email instead of clicking and going to CRM to export it?

Hey <@USNEEGC4F> - Ive never been on the metrics side of things - but it looks like you can select which reports to send from a dashboard when you click into it. It looks like this might be the only way to send individual reports though.
But this may only send the chart and the crm link. They might still need to click and come to HubSpot to export the report.
